1.「古き踊り子の チカラの根源。| 軽やかでもあり チカラ強くもある……| 神妙な: The root of the power of the old dancers. The|mysterious, ancient steps that are both light|and powerful.

2.「やっぱり来たのね <cs_pchero>。| 足音を聞いただけでも わかるわ。: I knew you were coming <cs_pchero>. I can|tell just by your footsteps. You've grown up|quite a bit.

5.「怨霊つきを 引き寄せてしまったようね……。| やっぱり 復活を邪魔されないよう:
I guess I've attracted a grudge... I knew|it... I'm having him attack the dancers with|his skill to prevent them from interfering|
|with his resurrection.

7.「グゥウウウ……コロ…セ！| オド…リコ……コロ……セ！: Guuuuuuu... colo... se! Odo... rico... colo...|se!

8.「３体か……。| さすがに 一度で浄化するのは| 無理があるわね。引きずり出すだ: Three... as expected, it's impossible to|purify them all at once. If we could just drag|them out...

10.「<cs_pchero>。悪いけど……チカラを貸して！| この球の中に 怨霊を:
. I'm sorry... but I need your|help! I've got a grudge trapped inside this|ball, but...dang it, I can't purify all three|
|of them at the same time.

11.「私が踊りをやめれば 封印は解け……| 逃げた怨霊が また誰かに とりついてしま:
If I stop dancing, the seal will be broken and|the fleeing ghosts will return to haunt|someone else. Before that happens... get|
|inside and destroy them!

12.「大丈夫……この縛霊球の中は 存外に広いのよ。| 舞い踊るのに 不自由は しない:
Don't worry... the inside of this ball is much|bigger than you think. It shouldn't be too|difficult for you to dance. I can't stay like|
|this for much longer.

13.「くうっ……遅いわよっ……！| さすがの私も……そろそろ……限界っ。| 今度こそ: Damn... you're late...! Even I... can't hold|out any longer. This time... defeat me...|please...

15.「ありがとう <cs_pchero>。どうやら 怨霊を| 浄化できたようね。あな: Thanks <cs_pchero>. It looks like you were|able to purge the grudge. Thanks to you, those|persons went home safely.

16.「……<cs_pchero>。| ここまで 巻き込んでしまったからには| あなた: ...<cs_pchero>. Now that I've gotten you|this far, I'll tell you all about it.

17.「書き置きしておいたように……| 私は 会いにきたの。| ここに眠っている かつ: As I left a note I came to see you. I've come|to see the man who once rested here...

18.「……と言っても 気休めなんだけどね。| 肉体も霊魂も ここには いないのだから: But that's just a comforting thought. There is|no body or spirit here...

19.「もうわかっていると思うけど| 私は ただの踊り子じゃないわ。| 歌や踊りのチカ: As you probably already know, I'm not just a|dancer. I'm someone who uses the power of song|and dance to sweep away grudges...

20.「怨霊の王たる 黒怨王と戦ってきた| いにしえの踊り子の一族……。| その最後の: The last survivor of an ancient family of|dancers who have fought against the Hell King.

21.「私には 果たすべき悲願があってね。| 一族に封印されては 復活をくり返してきた:
I have a long-cherished wish to fulfill. I|have a long-cherished wish to completely|purify the Hell King, who has been repeatedly|
|resurrected after being sealed away by my|family.

22.「でも……私は 失敗したの。| 私は 合方を……アイツを犠牲にして……| 彼ごと: But...I failed. I had no choice but to|sacrifice Goho... and him... to seal the Hell|King.

23.「だから……黒怨王の復活を感じたとき| 絶対 カタキを討たなきゃ……って思ったの: So...when I sensed the Hell King's|resurrection, I knew I had to take down|Kataki...

24.「ナッチョスは 何も聞かず 協力してくれたわ。 | 私の合方に ふさわしい素質を: Nachos cooperated with me without asking any|questions. I was to find the right person for|my partner and raise him...

25.「あなたは それらを 見事にこなし成長した。| 最初は認めたくなかったけど……あ:
You've grown into them with flying colors. I|didn't want to admit it at first, but your|talent is as good as any I've seen in the|
|past.

26.「でもね。この前 カイユの葉を渡されたとき| なんだか 怖くなったのよ……。|:
But you know what? The other day, when you|handed me the Kaiyu Leaf, I got kind of|scared... wondering if I really wanted to|
|involve you in this.

27.「じつは アイツからも 同じように| カイユの葉をもらったことが あってね……。: I had received a Kaiyu Leaf from him once as|well, and I felt like I was repeating the same|mistake.

28.「だけど その成長ぶりを見て 決心がついたわ。| 今は あなたのチカラを信じ 前:
But seeing how you've grown has made me|determined. Now is the time to believe in your|power and move forward. This is no time to be|
|afraid.

29.「だから……どうかお願いよ <cs_pchero>。| 今度こそ 黒怨王を 完全: So... please, please <cs_pchero>. This time,|to completely purify Hell King. Will you be my|partner?<yesno><close>

30.「……そう言われても 仕方ないわ。 | カタキ討ちなんて ひとりでするのがスジよ:
I don't blame you if you say so. It's natural|for one person to take down a katakana alone,|isn't it? But the Hell King can only be|
|defeated by two.

31.「そして さっきの戦いで 確信したのよ。 | こんなに 頼りになる合方は 他にい: And I was convinced after the fight earlier.|There is no one else I can rely on like you.|You are my only hope. So...please.<yesno><close>

32.「……確かに 私は かつての合方を| 見殺しにしてしまった。でも……| あなたは: It's true that I left my former partner to|die. But...I will protect you even if it costs|me my life.

33.「それに このまま 黒怨王を放っておけば| 無関係の踊り子が 犠牲になってしまう: Besides, if the Hell King is left unchecked,|innocent dancers will be sacrificed. I|cannot allow that to happen. So, please!<yesno><close>

34.「そもそも この前まで あなたの方から| 合方になりたい……って言ってた気が……: I thought...you wanted to be my partner in the|first place... You'll be my partner won't you?<yesno><close>

35.「全部 私のカンチガイだったというの？| ウソよね？ 冗談よね？| 私の 合方に: You think I'm crazy about all of this? Is it a|lie? Are you kidding me? You'll be my|partner... won't you?<yesno><close>

36.「……ありがとう。あなたになら 安心して| 背中を あずけることが できるわ。: Thank you. I feel safe leaving my back to you.

37.「本当はもっと ふたりで 修練を積みたいけど| 黒怨王の復活は 近いわ。あなたに: I really wish we could train together more,|but the Hell King's return is imminent. I need|you to get ready for that as soon as possible.

38.「そうね……いったん 獅子門のテントに| 戻りましょ。くわしい話は その時にさせ: Well... let's go back to the tent at Lion|Gate. We can talk more about it then.

39.「それじゃ よろしく頼んだわよ。: Well then, I've asked you to take care of it.

40.「でも…… 一度に ３体も現れるなんて。| ……モタモタしてる 余裕はないか。: But... three at once. I guess we don't have|time to waste.

41.「その悲願を果たすべく 私は かつて| 合方と共に 復活した黒怨王に挑んだ……。: To fulfill this long-cherished dream, I|challenged the Hell King, who had once|resurrected along with Godo...

42.「ただ それには どうしても| 新しい合方が必要だった……。: But to do that, I really needed a new way of|combining the two...

43.「ナッチョスには 教えてないけど| 転職の時の通過儀礼も その後の怨霊退治も|:
I didn't tell Nachos, but the rite of passage|when I changed jobs and the subsequent|exorcism of the grudge was a ritual to release|
|the power of the exorcism.
